page.title: 10CAERWYS WALK
page.content: On June 4th we went on a walk starting off at Ysgol yr Esgob.We went up Pen-y-Cefn Road to the Old School and turned down the High Street.We passed Mr.Morgan,the butcher,D & M.Jones, Haulage Contractors.We crossed the main road and went down Water Street passed the grocers,The Royal Oak and Bethel Chapel.We now left the built up area and walked down a narrow hedge lined road to the Sewage Works and the Seven Springs Trout Fisheries.We intended to turn right here through Coed Trefraith,but the pathway was overgrown with nettles,so we followed another footpath straight up the slope through the woods.In the woods we found the followingn wild flowers:-{ {Bluebells,Whitebells,Stitchwart,Bugle, {Common Vetch and Broad-leaved Garlic.
